results.title: Various sports
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “1976 Olympic Films”
Various sports from the 1976 Olympic Games Montreal, Canada. Includes, high jump, long jump, triple jump, pole vault. Silent film.

results.title: Running
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “1976 Olympic Films”.
Compiled as a visual aid to coaching and physical education, this film collects silent, slow-motion footage of the men’s track events at the 1976 Montreal Olympics.

results.title: [Various women's athletic events from the 1976 Olympic Games]
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “1976 Olympic Films”
Shows various women’s events from the 1976 Olympic Games. Includes jumping events - pole vaulting, high jump, long jump and throwing events - shot put, javelin. Also shown are baton relay, running hurdles, endurance events. Silent film.

results.title: Backstroke: women
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “1976-1980 Olympic & world class swimmers”.
The fundamentals of backstroke are shown by swimmers Tracey Caulkins, Kim Carlisle, Linda Jezek, Melissa Belote and Cheryl Gibson. Includes booklet.

results.title: Freestyle
results.creator_credit: Rick Pepin, Dan Ryan and Aquaforum Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “1976-1980 Olympic & world class swimmers”.
One of a series of films which shows swimmers, and their styles and techniques. Slow motion is used to clarify the demonstrations. This film concentrates on freestyle swimming.

results.title: Butterfly
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “1976-1980 Olympic & world class swimmers”.
One of a series of films which shows swimmers, and their styles and techniques. Slow motion is used to clarify the demonstrations. This film concentrates on butterfly swimming. Swimmers featured include Mike Bruner, Steve Gregg and Joe Bottom.
